comments: He\'s very mean, he has yelled at my class on numerous occasions for cell phones going off, he has swore at us a few times. He really doesn\'t care about your understanding and actually just expects you to perfectly understand it and becomes angry if you don\'t. He gives incredibly hard tests that are virtually impossible to study for and is boring AF
He is such a nice professor!! I really enjoyed his class, and teaching style! Would take him again in a heartbeat!
Very easy class. Only had two tests, two papers, and one presentation. And you used the first paper for the beginning of the second paper! He\'s very nice...just boring lectures.

Great teacher! Sometimes rambles on about stories that are not related to class but keeps it interesting. Not a lot of studying needed to get A\'s on test. Deff not a time consuming class! 5.0 for sure!

He\'s a reaaaally easy teacher. Boring lectures but half the time you just watch movies. He doesn\'t give like anything you do back. but he tells you how to do all the labs and the paper step by step. Plus the paper is soo easy because he wants pictures.

he\'s a really nice guy that cares about his students. however the class is sooo boring. i slept so much and still got an A. dont buy the book if u take his natural disasters class, we never used it once. waste of money. we went on a field trip that was fun. class is an easy A. dull, but easy.
